long_description: stephanie & nicole neofotis's artisan jewelry is handmade using traditional metalsmith techniques. sterling silver, gold and bronze are used with semi-precious and precious gemstones to complete their american made collections. neofotis & company is located in water trough hill farm, 148 water trough hill, buena vista, virginia, 24416-4304. the sites were designed to promote the various products and services offered by neofotis and company and encourage participation in the various activities and promotions available on the sites. we reserve the right to change, modify, add, or delete the terms of use from time to time without further notice. our website is not intentionally targeted to children under the age of 13. our widgets are a self-contained application through which you can display select content, products and services. if you're asking if we'll customize jewelry you find on our site, we often doâ€¦ how can we help.

generated_description: neofotis & company is an american jewelry company that specializes in handmade artisan jewelry made using traditional metalsmith techniques. the company is owned by stephanie and nicole neofotisi, who use sterling silver, gold, and bronze with semi-precious and precious gemstones to create their collections, which include wedding jewelry, rings, lost wax castings, estate jewelry, handmade necklaces, earrings, bracelets, and cross pendants. their designs are classic and timeless, suitable for both casual wear and formal occasions, and can be passed down through generations.
